project.description: Merge a stage pull request after tests have passed in serial

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LI_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull id to use for the li repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CRANKCASE_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull id to use for the crankcase repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RHC_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull id to use for the rhc repo.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf li rhc crankcase openshift-dev-tools git clone git@github.com:openshift/openshift-dev-tools.git
git clone git@github.com:openshift/li.git pushd li git checkout stage popd if [ -n "$LI_PULL_ID" ] then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/li/pull/$LI_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $LI_PULL_ID --repo li fi
git clone git@github.com:openshift/crankcase.git pushd crankcase git checkout stage popd if [ -n "$CRANKCASE_PULL_ID" ] then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/crankcase/pull/$CRANKCASE_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $CRANKCASE_PULL_ID --repo crankcase fi
git clone git@github.com:openshift/rhc.git pushd rhc git checkout stage popd if [ -n "$RHC_PULL_ID" ] then set +x echo "
*****Locally Merging Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/rhc/pull/$RHC_PULL_ID" set -x test_pull_requests --local_merge_pull_request $RHC_PULL_ID --repo rhc fi
set +x echo "
" set -x
pushd li build/devenv build merge_pull_request_stage ${BUILD_NUMBER} --terminate --install_from_local_source --instance_type m1.large --use_stage_repo popd
# Make sure all the pull requests will merge cleanly if [ -n "$LI_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --test_merge_pull_request $LI_PULL_ID --repo li fi
if [ -n "$CRANKCASE_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --test_merge_pull_request $CRANKCASE_PULL_ID --repo crankcase fi
if [ -n "$RHC_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --test_merge_pull_request $RHC_PULL_ID --repo rhc fi
# Do the merge if [ -n "$LI_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --merge_pull_request $LI_PULL_ID --repo li fi
if [ -n "$CRANKCASE_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --merge_pull_request $CRANKCASE_PULL_ID --repo crankcase fi
if [ -n "$RHC_PULL_ID" ] then test_pull_requests --merge_pull_request $RHC_PULL_ID --repo rhc fi
